{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Yun Jin
|date               = 2023-05-21
|zh                 = 
;今天是云堇的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''旅行者：'''这样可以吗？
:'''云堇：'''手臂再举高些…没错！不愧是旅行者，身段相当标致。
:'''派蒙：'''那我呢那我呢？云堇，也看看我！
:'''云堇：'''派蒙也很帅气哦。
:'''旅行者：'''要保持这个姿势，还是有些吃力…
:'''旅行者：'''舞剑的时候，因为担心动作不够标准，身体也会变得僵硬。
:'''旅行者：'''但云堇在台上总是能做到形神兼备，真的好厉害。
:'''云堇：'''别心急，台上的功夫可不是一朝一夕就能练成的，作为新人，你已经做得很棒了。
:'''云堇：'''这次多亏有你们帮忙。对了，等到演出结束后，一起去品茶吧。
|dialogue_review_zh = 「等到演出结束后，一起去品茶吧。」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Yun Jin]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Traveler:''' How's this?
:'''Yun Jin:''' Just raise your arm a little higher... That's it! Your figure is impeccable! As expected of the Traveler.
:'''Paimon:''' What about Paimon? Look over here, Yun Jin!
:'''Yun Jin:''' Paimon's really cool too.
:'''Traveler:''' This posture's pretty hard to maintain...
:'''Traveler:''' Whenever I try to do a sword dance, I always stiffen up because I'm worried my moves aren't sharp enough.
:'''Traveler:''' But your performances are always so lively and fluid. You're so amazing, Yun Jin.
:'''Yun Jin:''' Don't rush it. It takes a lot of time to build up the skills required for the stage. You're already doing great as someone new to the art. 
:'''Yun Jin:''' Thank goodness we had your help this time around. Oh right! Once the performance is over, let's go have some tea.
|dialogue_review_en = "Once the performance is over, let's go have some tea."
}}
